workflow_metadata.name: Dev-Post Feedback Loop Initialization
workflow_metadata.description: Establish continuous improvement cycle integrating runtime signals and user feedback back into architecture & code.

steps.description: Capture first-week telemetry deltas vs baselines
Feed production incident learnings into architecture change log
Update service_architecture.json or observability.json where drift detected
Prioritize backlog items from operational insights
Monitor mission effectiveness metrics in production
Collect ongoing user feedback and usage patterns
Update SUCCESS_CRITERIA.md based on real-world data
